website_summaries.verdict: The best industrial pallet buster designed to preserve the wood as much as possible.
pros: Articulating head helps to apply gentle but firm pressure on pallet wood to prevent breakage when possible
Included handle is comfortable while providing leverage
A good tool for removing dock boards
cons: Buster jaws can be difficult to fit correctly between the pallet slats

customer_reviews.title: Great quality at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Do not take pallets apart any other way! This is a must! Great quality at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Hannon

customer_reviews.title: Built like a tank!
customer_reviews.text: Yes it's heavy, yes it's bright yellow, and no it don't take no prisoners!! This is built to last a bit heavy but it's not him a bend or break like the cheaper models. I've tried the 1/4 inch steel models and when you are tearing into oak or maple pallets they bend or tweak the steel...idk about you but I hate breaking tools when I spend almost a bill. Overall I'm satisfied with this product.....its heavy and big and mean but that's what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Ja Ja

customer_reviews.title: Great tool. Cuts time in half. But need a few tips before using (in my comments)
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty well. Just need food leverage and boots on to work best. It's very heavy which does help with leverage, but you need boots or heavy shoes and get a good stance and stand on one end of the pallet to work best. Also make sure that the handles are placed under the WHOLE width of the pallet or it WILL split it. Took me the first three boards before I got the hand of it. It split one, then semi-cracked the other two before I figured out you need the hands/claws under the whole wood or it'll crack where it isn't under the whole board. Pretty happy with it. 4 stars for learning curve and is weight.
customer_reviews.author: Devan M. Perine

customer_reviews.title: What a relief.
customer_reviews.text: I was about to retire from make pallet furniture and whatever when I found this handy tool. Saved my back, my arms, my sanity! I was tearing pallets apart the old fashioned and frustrating way when I discovered this pallet buster. Works great for removing deck boards that need to be replaced too. What a relief it is.
customer_reviews.author: JME

customer_reviews.title: Couldn’t imagine building without it. Though still, it’s tedious. Cheaper options around too
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy as they come. Lovely tool. Don’t even bother dissembling palate wood without one. But, I still manage to snap plank, get stumped before completing a break down, and end up just buying cheap lumber. I’d say for a die hard pallet crafter, grab a cheaper option of the same tool. It’ll have the same Leverage and thriftiness is the game anyhow yeah? Maybe some youth e guides will reveal some techniques
customer_reviews.author: Jerd Derk

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty and efficient!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this tool! We had read reviews/answered questions that said it doesn't fit around 4x4 but in his experience, it does work on 4x4 stringers. It fits his needs perfectly and he's ecstatic! Also great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Megolopasus

customer_reviews.title: Glad to have it
customer_reviews.text: I do a lot of work with pallet wood, and this breaker has cut my time down from 30-40 minutes to 5-10 minutes breaking them apart. It also taught me which pallets to leave behind when picking pallets. My buster was hard to use on pallets with the boards only an inch apart, and the ones with the blocks instead of 2X4's. For me, that's a picking issue, not the breaker.
customer_reviews.author: ARobinson

customer_reviews.title: Massive time saver
customer_reviews.text: HEAVY DUTY tool. While it is a really heavy duty tool, it is also physically very heavy. This is a good thing though since you’re not swinging it over your head. If you are then you’re doing it very wrong and probably shouldn’t be using tools at all. But I digress. Ultra sturdy and simple to use. TKenyiur time and apply even pressure whenever you can instead of slamming the the handle down, which I know is necessary sometimes. Well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Steven N. Hetzer

customer_reviews.title: Still not easy but makes it much easier to break pallets apart
customer_reviews.text: It does what it was designed to do. It takes a bit of experimentation to get the fingers at the bottom of the pallet buster under the boards of the pallet, and once you have them there, you have to brace yourself on the pallet, then push really hard on the buster handle, often several times. I was almost always able to break the boards loose without them splitting, which is almost impossible when using a simple crowbar. I built 4 40" x 40" raised garden beds from about 6 pallets. They look great and are serving their purpose well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Well Built Tool. Great Time Saver.
customer_reviews.text: This tool makes tearing up decking or pallet wood quick and efficient. It's built like it's going to last forever, it is a little on the heavy side but I would rather it be built strong and heavy then light and weak. The swivel ends get you into a prefect angle to pop the boards up without breaking them (great feature if you are trying to save the boards).
customer_reviews.author: UniteOrDie1776

customer_reviews.title: This product is awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome!!! It definitely breaks down pallets in very little time compared to other methods!!! Very sturdy built, should last a lifetime with normal use (or intended use). This is one of the very best busters on the market, and made in USA. The only drawback is that it is a little on the heavy side, making it a little bit of a challenge for some females or non-muscular types after breaking down several pallets. But compared to the old method, definitely saves time in the end. Would highly recommend this product!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: brad

customer_reviews.title: Not Just for Pallets
customer_reviews.text: I used it to tear my 20x24 deck apart. Very little screws used - almost all nails. Even was helpful in pulling 2x6s and 8s from 4x4s that were nail happy and carriage bolted together. Now I have a huge pile of recycled lumber.
customer_reviews.author: S. Halsey

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. Wish I had it years ago when I use to struggle so hard to recover even just a handful of boards. Well made. I read that it was not good for wide boards but it is if you loosen the board as far as it can go on all nailed sections then slide the buster further under the half loosened board to pry the rest of the nails. Don't try to pry a wide board in one go or it will break the board.
customer_reviews.author: Hey-Hey-Hey

customer_reviews.title: A pallet busting beast!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this buster to help break down pallets. It's an absolute beast! It is as rugged as can be doesn't show any signs of wear after over 100 pallets broke down. Even stubborn hardwood pallets or ribbed nails don't stand a chance. The product is worth every bit of money spent. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Vermont Consumer

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to use and did a great job
customer_reviews.text: Received my pallet buster today. I immediately went out and bought 3 pallets to try it out on. It was easy to use and did a great job. I was able to remove most of the wood without cracking or busting it. I had watched a couple of short videos on how to use a pallet buster and followed the few instructions they had and it all worked out well. It has some weight to it, but you need that to do the work necessary. My 11 year old grandson was able use it with no problem. I am 72 years old and I was able to do it quickly. Makes all the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Carol L.

customer_reviews.title: I like to use reclaimed pallet wood and this is way ...
customer_reviews.text: I like to use reclaimed pallet wood and this is way better than the hammer method I used to break down pallets. I haven't mastered this tool yet, so I still occasionally lose some pieces of wood to cracking and splitting. If I ever learn that it was me and not the tool responsible for the cracking I will come back and change this to a 5 star review. Combine this with a pneumatic nail punch to make breaking down pallets a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: jonathan F

customer_reviews.title: makes the job so much easier
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, makes my life easier. The only thing I would do different is add a foot peddle to the back. I welded a pipe on to mine and it take zero effort now to pop boards loose. But over all I got my moneys worth. No more broken boards while removing.
customer_reviews.author: James Frasure

customer_reviews.title: It friggin works
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny, the pivoting head really helps prevent tearing up boards. If you need to break down pallets, and want to reuse the wood, I've found no better option. Especially when trying to remove pallet boards with spiral nails. Half of the time those nails will pull right through the wood, but this is superior to crowbars or heavy hammers.
customer_reviews.author: dedla

customer_reviews.title: Can't talk long; I've got pallets to bust
customer_reviews.text: It arrived 10 minutes ago. I'd been watching for the UPS truck all day. I dissembled one pallet already. I could be wrong, but my bet is that anyone rating this fewer than 5 stars has never tried to dissemble a pallet without it. Just sayin'. Yes, some slats may break using the Pallet Buster. But that's the nature of the beast. My only regret is that I didn't buy this thing two years ago, when I started making pallet wood furniture. Gotta go. Got pallets to bust.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey D. Cohan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: So far I have dismantled around 5 pallets with the pallet buster. I find it easy to use and not too heavy. I weigh around 160lbs and dismantling pallets is a good workout. The first plank on the ends is a bit difficult to remove. Also wood from pallets that have been out in the weather for several months will be more likely to break when dismantling which is not surprising.
customer_reviews.author: HappyGoLucky

customer_reviews.title: Great Product !! Rated A1 jn my book
customer_reviews.text: My pallet buster arrived today and I couldnt be happier w my decision to purchase it. Arrived just as described, shipped in appropriate container and arrived a day early!! I put it right to work on some pallets i needed to disassemble for a project and it performed well way beyond my expectations!! Im definitely going to recommend this to my fellow pallet crafters... so much easier than using a pry bar or hammer annnnnd NO MORE BROKEN BOARDS!!!!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Makes breaking apart pallets a breeze!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pallet buster to try to reduce time and effort on breaking down old pallets. This is a much easier way to break down pallets. I tried many methods including a sawzall and prefer this way the most. So much easier now. This is made very heavy duty and I’m not worried about it breaking ever.
customer_reviews.author: John J

customer_reviews.title: Lever arms have some play in them
customer_reviews.text: The tool works very well as intended but personally I found the lever arms that rotate to be nice and annoying at the same time. Whenever I needed leverage, the arms would rotate if not fully under the board. This creates problems getting started on a board off a pallet. Other than the slight mishap, I like it a lot
customer_reviews.author: Matthew R. Savage

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: This tool is AMAZING! I started using it, right after I recieved it. I took apart one pallet in less than 5 minutes!( Which is much quicker than 15+ minutes using a hammer and pry bar.) It makes taking pallets apart so much easier and quicker. It's a back saver! I got my pig pen done in three hours thanks to this awesome pallet buster.
customer_reviews.author: Clarisa

customer_reviews.title: Great Pallet Buster
customer_reviews.text: Although not the cheapest option, it is one of the more durable ones that I could find, and it does a great job standing up to everything I put it against. I broke up over 100 pallets with this tool, saving significantly more wood than not having it! I have used it on removing deck boards and framing boards from various projects, and it was able to perform as expected, and in some cases better than expected. I look forward to it's continuing use for the foreseeable future!
customer_reviews.author: Nick Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great product, easy to use, excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: I use pallets for a lot of projects and always hated the process of dismantling them. This unit has changed that, I love it, it is so fast and easy to use. I get more usable wood than before. I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Seegmiller

customer_reviews.title: This thing works, and works well!
customer_reviews.text: It works. I'm building a few things around the house- a cabinet, a compost bin- out of pallet wood and this was by far the best purchase for the projects. I tried busting pallets up all different ways, but never have I gotten so much usable wood. The only thing I can say bothers me, is the flat levers that come in contact with the board you're prying could be another 1/2 inch longer.
customer_reviews.author: Krz

customer_reviews.title: Don't pull pallets apart without it!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these things. I ended up giving this one to my father and buying a new one for myself because he liked it so much. It makes life much easier when working with larger quantities of pallets.
customer_reviews.author: George L. Jweid

customer_reviews.title: Great product rip through those pallets and reuse that wood
customer_reviews.text: Skeptical at first but when I started using it you get a rhythm and wow is it easy and fast you move right through the pallet now if we could find an automatic way to remove those stubborn nails
customer_reviews.author: Seh Welch

customer_reviews.title: Fastest way to dissemble pallets!!!
customer_reviews.text: You wanna talk about the easiest way to break up pallets without splitting the wood?!? This is it. Takes me 2 minutes max to break up a pallet. I go through them without sweating. Best tool ever when it comes to pallets! Also it’s very sturdy and made out of good material. You’re getting a quality tool for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Kourtny Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Warehouse pallet buster
customer_reviews.text: We use this for stubborn and strange sized pallets we cant recycle. We tend to grab ol Bertha and break them down when we have some down time. There is a process to pulling pallets apart and if you are using anything else it might take quite a bit longer than using this.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Well designed, tough, efficient.
customer_reviews.text: All that has been said about the weight of these is true. It is heavy. So, eat a good breakfast and get over it! It is a heavy duty tool that you're going to beat and pull on. it will stand it, and separate one board from another without undue damage like you want it to.I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Household Woodworks

customer_reviews.title: This is one amazing tool!
customer_reviews.text: It takes a few try's to figure out the correct technique but once you do you will be amazed by efficiency of this tool. Not only will this tool speed up your work but it will also increase your yield of useable lumber.
customer_reviews.author: Jmc7228

customer_reviews.title: I Love It
customer_reviews.text: The only way to go if you have many pallets to take apart. Saves the boards on the ends vs cutting them next to the runners. This tool is much better than ones that do not pivot under the board. This one keeps even pressure under the board and allows for much less breaking of the boards
customer_reviews.author: Michael Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Not so much for heavy duty pallets
customer_reviews.text: This tool is good with the regular sized/made pallet. However, I have the heavy duty long and close approximated wood pallet. It would not slip through between the planks. I need to make some other interventions to make it work. Otherwise, it’s still a great tool.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: The hinges and fork-lift like prongs are brilliant.
customer_reviews.text: Best tool ever for deck board removal! I am flipping deck boards, which were screwed in. I removed most of the screws, but some wouldn't budge and I was ruining the boards with a pry bar. The pallet buster distributed the pressure over a much larger area, was longer so I could move along the deck and use it standing up, and reduced the number of boards I had to discard. I've recommended it to anybody I think might be interested.
customer_reviews.author: pjl

customer_reviews.title: It works but not the most efficient
customer_reviews.text: I needed to break pallets and this does the job, eventually I realized it would be faster to just take a saw to the pallets though
customer_reviews.author: J&M

customer_reviews.title: Awkward to use
customer_reviews.text: This product is quite heavy and awkward to use on old pallets! I recommend it but only to those willing to fight with it somewhat!
customer_reviews.author: Nick Pregent

customer_reviews.title: Beyond Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: How did I ever live without this? I used to take pallet's apart with a hammer and crow bar. Usually took over an hour (sometimes two) to get them apart. With this tool I can take them apart in just minutes. It's well built and looks and feels like it will last for years. This is a quality tool folks.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm. Little bit of a learning curve.
customer_reviews.text: Works like you would think it would. Built like a tank! Don't worry about it breaking..ever! I have researched a lot of these. This one was even a better design than you can see on here. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This pallet buster saves time and material. Easy to use, additional leverage adds stability and minimizing splitting boards for reuse
customer_reviews.author: Edward Dytko

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money !
customer_reviews.text: Great tool . I honestly am pretty happy with it , works great. Only thing I don't like is when the boards are close together. It's pretty hard to use then . Other then that killer tool !
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Not good for European pallets
customer_reviews.text: If your pallets come from Europe, they are slightly thicker than American made pallets. The jack wont fit over the crossmember to lift the slats. When it fits on American pallets, the slats lift up very easily. Works great. Check size first.
customer_reviews.author: sunlover

customer_reviews.title: it wasn't bad, but this tool is so much easier
customer_reviews.text: This tool makes breaking apart larger (4" x 4") type pallets a piece of cake, seriously, I had been using a Klein 6' wrecking bar, it wasn't bad, but this tool is so much easier. Well worth the money. If I had one complaint, I would like a slightly longer handle.
customer_reviews.author: thinkaboutit

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Wow when the kids were using a crowbar to take apart pallets they were cracking or breaking every other board ..this tool worked with little or no damage 95% of time . great product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Find and watch a YouTube tutorial how ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Find and watch a YouTube tutorial how to use properly before giving a bad rating
customer_reviews.author: Anthony S. Ewers

customer_reviews.title: Too heavy and SLOW
customer_reviews.text: SOOOOOO HEAVY AND MASSIVE DOES NOT FEET BETWEEN BOARDS TOO BULKY AND DIFFICULT To work.
customer_reviews.author: db

customer_reviews.title: Did not work at all
customer_reviews.text: I had high Hope's bit this did not work at all. I watched tutorial videos, I tried several different pallets, even hubby tried. Nothing worked. This didnt break apart pallets.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Chiarappi (Morann)

customer_reviews.title: great tool
customer_reviews.text: This is great. I can break down a pallet in 30 minutes, before I really struggled trying to get a pallet torn apart now I have no problems at all. I really like how easy it is to use.
customer_reviews.author: L.B

customer_reviews.title: This is an amazing tool. 15lbs
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing tool. 15lbs!!! Excellent design. Very well built. Even if you saw the ends, you still have to pry the middle.... and this does the trick....for 1/3 less than the others!
customer_reviews.author: av8r

customer_reviews.title: Makes the labor easy!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this tool! It takes all the effort out of pulling apart pallets. It is on the heavy side. However it is made to last forever.
customer_reviews.author: Lana Cherry

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great, very heavy duty build. Doubles as zombie killing battleaxe.
customer_reviews.author: Ian J Burchett

customer_reviews.title: stout tool
customer_reviews.text: I have attempted to build a couple with my bad welding skills but this is the way to go,this tool is stout ,very well built. Kinda heavy especially after a few pallets,but it's a winner.
customer_reviews.author: woodsman5150

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: The pallet buster worked great. The only boards that we broke were those that were already questionable to start with. Cut the time of taken a pallet apart by 80 to 90 %. Love using this tool, very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Psych

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but good.
customer_reviews.text: Works well and I guess the heavy weight is necessary. Once I figured out a system, which I patented, there were no more splits boards.
customer_reviews.author: Sidney Pratt

customer_reviews.title: If you rip pallets, buy it now.
customer_reviews.text: This made quick work ripping a pallet. I wish I purchased one some time ago.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You know you need this!
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome, if you ever have the desire to make things with pallets this is a must have! It will literally make your job so much easier, and who knows what you’ll be able to do will all that extra time on your hands! If I had a dollar for every min I saved from this fancy contraption, I’d be a rich man!
customer_reviews.author: Blu

customer_reviews.title: Works exactly as intended. It might break some plants ...
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as intended. It might break some plants but its not a tool issues versus a thin old plank issue. But you will find there are ways to work around that and still come back with a lot of free material.
customer_reviews.author: Jankys13

customer_reviews.title: Fast
customer_reviews.text: This thing rips pallets down in minutes, without breaking any of the pieces.
customer_reviews.author: ryan

customer_reviews.title: I can see where some of the other varieties would work better but I have learned some tricks with this one
customer_reviews.text: If you do anything with pallets, you have to have one of these. It will make a man out of you I will say. Watch some videos and you can be busting pallets and saving wood in no time. I can see where some of the other varieties would work better but I have learned some tricks with this one.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: works pretty good, does tear up some of the boards though
customer_reviews.author: Rogue1

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: So far i am stoked to have this little tool. And i just got it today. Simple to use and so far breaking down 2 pallets because of a rainy day , not a board broke. VERY IMPRESSED , well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: joey s phifer

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome!!! It came yesterday and I busted a pallet apart in no time. I like to disassemble my pallets and leave the nail holes in the wood rather than cut them off and this works great. I will just have to push the nails back out after pulling the wood apart but that is easy compared to the time and effort it took to disassemble with a hammer and cat's paw.
customer_reviews.author: S. Cogar

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome!! My son (17) was able to break ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome!! My son (17) was able to break the pallets boards with ease - did about 10 in less than an hour with very little waste. Has some weight to it, but since we are breaking apart very heavy pallets, I believe the weight would be necessary. Am VERY happy I broke down and purchased this - has made our remodeling/building a whole lot easier than the struggle we have had for the last several months!!! Would definitely recommend this!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tria Cotten

customer_reviews.title: The Best For The Job.
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly the product we were looking for. It makes breaking apart pallets so much easier, with less damage to the boards.It is also easier on me, less straining, and fewer injuries.
customer_reviews.author: Dalene K.

customer_reviews.title: So easy a ten year old can use it
customer_reviews.text: Wish I had this years ago. I can fully disassemble a heavy duty pallet in two minutes flat. We even timed it. Using this my ten year old is now on pallet duty and loves it.
customer_reviews.author: High Tech Redneck

customer_reviews.title: Get on if you work on pallets
customer_reviews.text: Had my douts, but WHAM, took me no time to rip apart the pallets... Best tool ever for pallet work
customer_reviews.author: Cooketts

customer_reviews.title: Excellent build quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent build quality, decent heft. The "jaws" do not seem to fit well between slats of most pallets that I have obtained, and I have not yet figured out a good way to get the first slat off to position the tool properly for the rest. It does seem to break a lot of boards, that could be my inexperience though.
customer_reviews.author: T0171

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Best tool ever for pallets so easy to use and works very well excellent quality highly recommend this product it’s great
customer_reviews.author: Barbara W.

customer_reviews.title: best way to bust up pallets and keep the boards usable
customer_reviews.text: this thing is a beast! i have tried every method of pallet break down and this is by far the best with the least damage to boards. fair warning - it is heavy! so you will get a workout while using!
customer_reviews.author: R. Porter

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Gave This as a Christmas gift. It worked very well! Made the job ten times easier.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Shay

customer_reviews.title: I'm mad I waited so long to by one of these.
customer_reviews.text: This has to be the most useful tool if you are reclaiming pallet wood for projects. Cuts the dismantling time of a pallet down to approx 5 minutes. It also enables you to salvage more wood per pallet, as I haven't broken one board yet with this tool, whereas I would typically split 3-4 boards the old way.
customer_reviews.author: Frank C.

customer_reviews.title: Took me a bit to get the hang of it ...
customer_reviews.text: Took me a bit to get the hang of it and once I did... I kept challenging myself to how long it takes to take a pallet apart. Very nice
customer_reviews.author: PrincessZorlon

customer_reviews.title: Worth double $$
customer_reviews.text: I don’t leave very many reviews or rate products. But this thing is amazing. I love working with pallet boards but due to a back injury was limited to disassembling one or two before I had to stop and half of them would be split . With this this I can take apart as many as I want to no problem and salvage twice as many boards. It’s not super heavy but heavy duty enuff to help with leverage and can tell it should last a lifetime. Couldn’t be more impressed
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tool. Used it to take about 15 pallets apart that I pulled out of the dumpster for pallet wood projects. This tool made taking the pallets apart a breeze with minimal damage to the wood
customer_reviews.author: J N Brown

customer_reviews.title: Headache saver
customer_reviews.text: Made easy work of busting pallets....a must have if you build with pallet wood!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Made my husband love me even more. I have been making him do pallet art so he has been breaking down a lot of pallet and this made it so easy for him.
customer_reviews.author: Bookmom2

customer_reviews.title: Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Works well on most pallets as long as spacing allows arms to get in between slats (not all allow this). Well made and durable. Movement of arms gives you more flexibility than what you can do with other models available. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Bill

customer_reviews.title: A++++. A must have for dismantling pallets
customer_reviews.text: Bought this on whim, not knowing what to expect. Item showed up promptly and as much higher quality than I ever imagined. Makes dismantling pallets an absolute breeze. Could not be happier with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Willey

customer_reviews.title: Break pallets quickly and reliably
customer_reviews.text: Does what it says. Way easier than a hammer and crowbar. You can break apart a pallet in 15 minutes or so without breaking the boards.
customer_reviews.author: Annalise

customer_reviews.title: Works exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: What else is there to say? This product makes short work of any pallet, with the exception of pallets with stretchers that are wider than 3 inches.
customer_reviews.author: Gretchandphil

customer_reviews.title: Heavy, could be improved. Make it in strong aluminum
customer_reviews.text: To heavy, placement in pallet confusing, must be to careful not to break wood. Use of a long forked pry bar was much better
customer_reviews.author: Robert S Conquest

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This works just as advertised, plain and simple. Also very heavy duty so it should be around for quite some time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well Built, Heavy
customer_reviews.text: Good welds and heavy which helps with leverage. It does what it says it does.
customer_reviews.author: HonestAbe

customer_reviews.title: Does what it's supposed to.
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what it is supposed to do. Tines could be a little narrower.
customer_reviews.author: michael diforte

customer_reviews.title: this works great. Very happy with this purchase worked as describe ...
customer_reviews.text: this works great. Very happy with this purchase worked as describe in the description
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very well made and gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: This product does exactly what they say it will do very sturdy made and very easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Michael Tincher

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: A little weird to figure out how to use it but if you’re breaking down pallets this is a must have.
customer_reviews.author: Vellokat

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great tool!!! Completely broke down 36 pallets in one day.
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works well once you have a board removed. Sometimes hard to maneuver between boards
customer_reviews.author: mark h.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tool.
customer_reviews.text: This thing has cut my time in half on taking pallets apart. It does what they say with little effort. Not a slats will come off perfectly with nails pulling though the boards but im new with this and im sure i will figure it out. Time saver and well built this will last for years.
customer_reviews.author: wayne w.

customer_reviews.title: Gotta have if you want pallet disassemby a breeze
customer_reviews.text: Wish I would have had this a long time ago. Was leary spending the money but now I wish I would have much earlier. Makes it easy to break down pallets.
customer_reviews.author: TedW

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. Can't seem to fit between narrow slats or remove slats on any pallets. Ultimately it is a big yellow piece of junk : ( I am hoping to return.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Owens

customer_reviews.title: Does its job
customer_reviews.text: Made breaking twenty plus pallets a breeze. Saved me many hours of stress.
customer_reviews.author: Steve O.

customer_reviews.title: Makes quick work if it.
customer_reviews.text: You still needed someone to hold opposite side down that you are working on. But it makes the work go a whole lot faster!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: B. Estes

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Makes pallet busting quick. Boards remain in good condition usually. Definitely an asset if you disassemble pallets.
customer_reviews.author: Gentle Ken

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just as described. Hopefully we’ll get the hang of it and the boards will pop off as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Clark

customer_reviews.title: pallet buster
customer_reviews.text: So glad I got this tool to take apart our pallets. Worked great. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ksutherly1959

customer_reviews.title: Does the job well!
customer_reviews.text: Is it a bit on the heavy side, sure, but not too heavy. I'm no muscle builder and I have no problem using this tool. I thought the price was fair and the outcomes have been so worth it. I've made tons of projects with pallets . Not disappointed in this tool one bit!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Wall buster
customer_reviews.text: Easy to tear down a nailed wall. Very strong. Heavy as to be expected. Well-engineered.
customer_reviews.author: Laurence

product_meta.title: Vergo Industrial Pallet Buster/Pallet Breaker - Premium Steel with Handle, 41"
product_meta.description: Get rid of broken or unsightly pallets quickly and safely. Lightweight and easy to use. Also can be utilized for dockboard removal. Perfect for do-it-yourself reclaimed pallet furniture projects.
feature_bullets: Deluxe pallet buster is designed for disassembling pallets easily
Articulating head won't break or split the wood
Features durable steel construction for added strength and long life
Can also be used for dock board removal

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars394 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
